thread.title: Watch Julio Jones's near-impossible sideline grab
thread.title_full: Watch Julio Jones's near-impossible sideline grab

title: Watch Julio Jones's near-impossible sideline grab
text:
There’s a saying about throwing the ball where only your receiver can catch it.
Well, Matt Ryan did literally that on this sideline pass to Julio Jones, who somehow stretched out to pull in the throw and was able to tap both feet inbounds.
ARE YOU KIDDING, @juliojones_11 ?! #SB51 #RiseUp pic.twitter.com/2CEH927VGO
— NFL (@NFL) February 6, 2017
As the NFL’s Twitter account put it: “Unbelievable.”
Ladies and gentlemen, @JulioJones_11 .
This is just unbelievable. #SB51 #RiseUp https://t.co/sUGgrtyevc
— NFL (@NFL) February 6, 2017
Fortunately for New England fans, the Patriots were able to stop the Falcons on the drive and even pushed them out of field-goal range, eventually forcing a punt to keep the score 28-20.
